vulnerabilities.title: Cross-Site-Scripting attack on `<RichTextField>`
vulnerabilities.description:
### Impact All React applications built with react-admin and using the `` are affected. `` outputs the field value using `dangerouslySetInnerHTML` without client-side sanitization. If the data isn't sanitized server-side, this opens a possible Cross-Site-Scripting (XSS) attack. Proof of concept: ```jsx import { RichTextField } from 'react-admin'; const record = { id: 1, body: `
